content: this stylish crochet hook case in beautiful neutral colors will keep your hooks safe and handy a lovely easy to make pattern is crocheted with 3 colors of fine weight cotton/linen blend and uses simple crochet stitches skill level easy finished size approx 8 ¼ x 3 inch 16 x 8cm materials yarn used scheepjes linen soft in 613 beige 619 light gray and 617 gray hook used e/4 3 5mm hook other supplies scissors yarn needle you can use any cotton/linen blend or other fine weight yarn 2 or sport in the usa 4 ply in the uk 5 ply in australia
